scripts.prep:mainnet: mustache templates/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen;
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run prep:mainnet; graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ knownorigin/known-origin
scripts.deploy:prod2: npm run prep:mainnet; graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ knownorigin/knownoriginprod2
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run prep:mainnet; graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ knownorigin/known-origin-staging
scripts.prep:rinkeby: mustache templates/rinkeby.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph rcodegen;
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: npm run prep:rinkeby; graph deploy --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ knownorigin/knownoriginrinkeby
scripts.prep:goerli: mustache templates/goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen;
scripts.deploy:goerli: npm run prep:goerli; graph deploy --product hosted-service knownorigin/known-origin-goerli
scripts.deploy:mainnet-studio: npm run prep:mainnet; graph deploy --studio known-origin
